dict.acceptation: 给…加薪；给…薪水；发…薪水；付…薪水；

sent.orig: Salary: Monthly salary RMB 7000 above during probation.
sent.trans: 工资待遇：试用期月薪7000元以上。

sent.orig: To manage salary funds and salary income of the Administration. 7.
sent.trans: 负责全局工资基金和工资收入管理工作。

sent.orig: Salary commensurate with experience. Successful candidates will be on basic salary+ sales commission+ car allowance.
sent.trans: 根据工作经验确定薪金水平，包括基本工资，销售佣金和车补。

sent.orig: Percent of all employees salary and returns them in descending order according to salary base rate.
sent.trans: 个百分比的雇员，并根据基本薪金按降序返回。

sent.orig: Salary: The company is offering a salary of 20000 per annum.
sent.trans: 这家公司招聘职员，年薪为20000。
